text: Khamti dharma ki allah‌ra'i jan'ya naya? Ara yara tamke bada diye an'yake abhibhabakarupe grahana kare -- ''amara tadera upasana kari na sudhu ejan'ya chara ye tara amadera allah‌ra nikatabarti abasthaya ene debe.’’ Nihsandeha allah tadera madhye bicara karabena se'i bisaye yate tara matabheda karachila. Nihsandeha allah take satpathe paricalita karena na ye khoda mithyabadi abisbasi.
